tc_games.app_data:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="__TCA:V1_GAME_ID" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:NOTES" value="Counter-Strike Global Offensive TCAdmin v2 Configuration File

Made by Brit for the TCAdmin Community" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="d3b2aa93-7e2b-4e0d-8080-67d14b2fa8a9:FileManager" value="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<FileManagerConfig xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 <EditPatterns>
 <string>*.cfg</string>
 <string>*.txt</string>
 <string>*.ini</string>
 </EditPatterns>
 <MaxEditSize>102400</MaxEditSize>
 <EnableDecompress>true</EnableDecompress>
 <EnableCompress>true</EnableCompress>
 <MaxCompressSize>52428800</MaxCompressSize>
 <EnableUpload>true</EnableUpload>
 <EnableDownload>true</EnableDownload>
 <DefaultFileName>custom.cfg</DefaultFileName>
 <WriteBom>false</WriteBom>
</FileManagerConfig>" type="TCAdmin.SDK.Web.FileManager.FileManagerConfig,TCAdmin.SDK.Web" /> <add key="d3b2aa93-7e2b-4e0d-8080-67d14b2fa8a9:VirtualDirectories" value="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<ArrayOfVirtualDirectorySecurity xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <PermissionMode>Basic</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>Root</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>ReadFile WriteFile DeleteFile RenameFile ListDirectory CreateDirectory DeleteDirectory RenameDirectory</Permissions>
 <ServerId>1</ServerId>
 <RootPhysicalPath>$[SubAdminFiles]</RootPhysicalPath>
 <VirtualDirectoryName>Sub Admin Files</VirtualDirectoryName>
 <AdditionalPermissions>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <Filters>*.exe;*.dll;*.so;*.bat;*.sh;*.cmd;*.vbs;*.pif;*.scr;*.com</Filters>
 <PermissionMode>None</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>File</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>None</Permissions>
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 <DisableSymlinkCheck>false</DisableSymlinkCheck>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 </AdditionalPermissions>
 <DisableSymlinkCheck>false</DisableSymlinkCheck>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <PermissionMode>Basic</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>Root</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>ReadFile WriteFile DeleteFile RenameFile ListDirectory CreateDirectory DeleteDirectory RenameDirectory</Permissions>
 <ServerId>2</ServerId>
 <RootPhysicalPath>$[ResellerFiles]</RootPhysicalPath>
 <VirtualDirectoryName>Reseller Files</VirtualDirectoryName>
 <AdditionalPermissions>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <Filters>*.exe;*.dll;*.so;*.bat;*.sh;*.cmd;*.vbs;*.pif;*.scr;*.com</Filters>
 <PermissionMode>None</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>File</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>None</Permissions>
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 <DisableSymlinkCheck>false</DisableSymlinkCheck>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 </AdditionalPermissions>
 <DisableSymlinkCheck>false</DisableSymlinkCheck>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <PermissionMode>Basic</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>Root</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>ReadFile WriteFile DeleteFile RenameFile ListDirectory CreateDirectory DeleteDirectory RenameDirectory</Permissions>
 <ServerId>3</ServerId>
 <RootPhysicalPath>$[UserFiles]</RootPhysicalPath>
 <VirtualDirectoryName>User Files</VirtualDirectoryName>
 <AdditionalPermissions>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <Filters>*.exe;*.dll;*.so;*.bat;*.sh;*.cmd;*.vbs;*.pif;*.scr;*.com</Filters>
 <PermissionMode>None</PermissionMode>

 </AdditionalPermissions>

 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
</ArrayOfVirtualDirectorySecurity>" type="TCAdmin.SDK.VirtualFileSystem.VirtualDirectorySecurity[],TCAdmin.SDK" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_BY" value="4" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_ON" value="2017-10-25 16:08:36" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_BY" value="4" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_ON" value="2017-11-12 20:29:36" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> </values>

tc_game_cmdlines.predef_cmdlines: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?> <ArrayOfPredefinedCommandLine xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <PredefinedCommandLine> <Id>7b05f7ac-98c7-4cd0-81f6-18b61f3312e5</Id> <CommandLine>-game csgo -console -condebug -usercon +game_type 0 +game_mode 0 -maxplayers_override $[Service.Slots] +maxplayers $[Service.Slots] +exec server.cfg +mapgroup mg_bomb +map de_dust -ip $[Service.IpAddress] -port $[Service.GamePort] -tickrate 128</CommandLine> <Description>Classic Casual</Description> </PredefinedCommandLine> <PredefinedCommandLine> <Id>7a998d80-808a-44a6-965d-a3fb4882517a</Id> <CommandLine>-game csgo -console -condebug -usercon +game_type 0 +game_mode 1 -maxplayers_override $[Service.Slots] +maxplayers $[Service.Slots] +exec server.cfg +mapgroup mg_bomb +map de_dust -ip $[Service.IpAddress] -port $[Service.GamePort] -tickrate 128</CommandLine> <Description>Classic Competitive</Description> </PredefinedCommandLine> <PredefinedCommandLine> <Id>49d28f18-21f4-485f-b350-ed79a8823c3f</Id> <CommandLine>-game csgo -console -condebug -usercon +game_type 1 +game_mode 0 -maxplayers_override $[Service.Slots] +maxplayers $[Service.Slots] +exec server.cfg +mapgroup mg_bomb +map de_dust -ip $[Service.IpAddress] -port $[Service.GamePort] -tickrate 128</CommandLine> <Description>Arms Race</Description> </PredefinedCommandLine> <PredefinedCommandLine> <Id>e5f86d2c-6d14-4ee0-903e-1e2ae9dc208e</Id> <CommandLine>-game csgo -console -condebug -usercon +game_type 1 +game_mode 1 -maxplayers_override $[Service.Slots] +maxplayers $[Service.Slots] +exec server.cfg +mapgroup mg_bomb +map de_dust -ip $[Service.IpAddress] -port $[Service.GamePort] -tickrate 128</CommandLine> <Description>Demolition</Description> </PredefinedCommandLine> </ArrayOfPredefinedCommandLine>

tc_game_mods.comments:
Info: Metamod:Source is a C++ plugin environment for Half-Life 2. It acts as a "metamod" which sits in between the Game and the Engine, and allows plugins to intercept calls that flow between. It provides a mechanism called SourceHook, a very powerful library for intercepting, overridding, and superseding virtual function calls.

Version: 1.10.6
tc_game_mods.app_data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="__TCA:NOTES" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:UNIQUE_ID" value="5965b8e2-fa13-44d9-9a9a-5733fd7e8569" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_BY" value="4" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_ON" value="2017-10-25 16:55:36" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_BY" value="4" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_ON" value="2017-10-25 19:17:05" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> </values>

tc_game_mods.comments:
Info: SourceMod is server modification for any game that runs on the Half-Life 2 engine. It is a powerful, highly optimized platform for scripting plugins and handling server administration.

Version: 1.9
